name: Coping Mechanism #2 - Online Gaming
description:
Jovan, 17, is a polytechnic student in Singapore. 

In the recent few months, he has been trying to heal from a heartbreak after being rejected by his female friend, whom he tried to pursue for two years. 

Playing online games is his way to avoid feeling upset; having clocked an average of 30 hours a week on the game - League of Legends. 

“Gaming helps me to be distracted temporarily because I won’t think of anything other than the game itself because I need to focus on it,” he said.  

As a result of the many hours spent on games, it has impacted his quality of sleep, having only 4 hours of sleep which makes him feel tired when he is in school.
